phrases: How do you like the pleasure of being enveloped by Junketsu?
I had no idea...
In all the world, only you and I can savor this pleasure.
Enjoy it to the fullest.
She is right, not even I know it!
I am so jealous, Ryuko!
The Life Fibers within Nui's body repel other fibers,
so even if she puts on a Kamui, she cannot draw on its power.
Yep.
That is why I chose to become Grand Couturier.
I will make the ultimate Kamui with my own two hands.
As you are now, you must know perfectly well what I am thinking.
Humans exist to serve clothing...
Indeed.
Life Fibers are the pinnacle of all life forms.
C'mon, Ryuko, hurry up and show me!
Let me see what you look like in your finest!
Life Fiber Override, Kamui Junketsu!
Wow, how beautiful!
Lady Ragyo, Lady Satsuki has escaped.
She what?
I will let you deal with her.
Understood.
You still want to avenge your father's death?
For luck.
I see that she is still unable to keep her emotions in check.
For someone with so little experience,
she has better technique than I expected...
Lady Ryuko has completely awakened, has not she?
When the life of its host is in danger, it causes the
Life Fibers to become even more active.
No matter how hard Soichiro tried to seal them away,
it would be child's play to reawaken her by making her
experience intense existential terror.
Hououmaru, have all company employees gather at REVOCS.
I will return to the mansion.
We are fast approaching the endgame, Nui.
My heart is pounding!
I would better work fast, then!
EPISODE 21 INCOMPLETE
Ryuko Matoi, to think you were my little sister...
Do not get all big-sisterly on me now!
You are making me puke.
I have absolutely no intention to.
I will crush anyone who is become a puppet of the Life Fibers,
no matter who they may be.
Let us begin, Senketsu!
Life Fiber Synchronize, Kamui Senketsu!
KAMUI SENKETSU
Synchronizing with Senketsu right after putting him on, huh?
That is our little miss Satsuki.
I can watch no longer!
Let us get in there, too!
We are going to support Lady Satsuki!
Wait!
What do you want, slacker?
We are a little busy!
I have a message for the Elite Four from Lady Satsuki!
Let us do this, Satsuki!
That is Bakuzan, huh?
You cannot let go of something that Mother smashed?
Talk about clingy!
It is not clinginess, it is vengeance!
Even if smashed to a million pieces,
if a single fragment remains, the whole can be reconstituted!
These two blades so lovingly protected by my Elite Four
are the symbol of my tenacity of purpose towards the
victory of Satsuki Kiryuin and Honnouji Academy!
When will you shut up?!
You talk louder than your actions.
You could not even control Junketsu
and you are not going to be able to summon up that knockoff's power.
You think Satsuki Kiryuin to be all talk, do you?
Then I will have to prove otherwise!
Senketsu Senjin!
Senketsu Senjin!
Senketsu Shippu!
Senketsu Shippu!
How dare you, little bitch!
I am only getting started!
Senjin Shippu!
Interesting!
Senjin Shippu!
Kay...
I think that is enough for today.
So you are not entirely useless.
Ryuko, take off that outfit and put me on.
No way.
As if I would stoop to looking that ridiculous ever again.
I look ridiculous?
Do you really mean that, Ryuko?
Damn straight.
What else would you call it but ridiculous
when you cannot tell if you are wearing anything?
To access the Life Fibers' power, while at
the same time ensuring the wearer
is not inadvertently enslaved, by minimizing the surface
area in direct contact.
That is the purpose of Life Fiber Synchronization.
You should call it a stroke of human genius.
Genius, my ass!
All I see is fear.
You want the power of clothing,
but you do not want your soul to be taken over.
That getup is that half-assed mindset in a nutshell.
All it is is pathetic!
That is not true.
When we were synchronized, you wore me and I was worn by you.
As it stands now, you are only being worn by Junketsu.
And what is wrong with that?
Being worn by it feels so amazing I cannot stand it!
Humanity was born to be worn by Life Fibers.
Being worn by them is the ultimate bliss.
That is the bliss of slavery.
Submit or die.
That is the sort of line you love to say!
Are not that right, Satsuki Kiryuin?!
Senketsu Senjin!
Senketsu Senjin!
Do not hold back!
Oh, I get it now.
So that is what is going on.
I knew it, you have not mastered wearing that Kamui properly.
Senketsu Shippu!
Too slow.
Senjin Shippu!
That one's slow, too!
Lady Satsuki!
What is she doing?!
What is the deal, huh?
You cannot fight back?
You cannot, cannot you?
Because I have seen through all your moves!
Come on!
Synchronization, my ass!
You and Senketsu are not synchronized at all!
You shout out your instructions, and Senketsu
attacks using his own strength!
That is why there is a split-second delay in your transformations!
You are the one who is just being worn by her Kamui!
You have not advanced one damn bit since the time you wore Junketsu!
I am so freaking sick of your empty talk.
Aw, what is the matter?
Are not you going to look down on me like you always do?
If you cannot stand on your own, how about I put you on your feet?
Feel better now, Little Miss Satsuki?
But you are not standing on anything.
You are a sad little princess who is standing on top of a sand castle.
The instant a wave comes, that castle comes crashing down.
Stop it, Ryuko!
I admit, Satsuki cannot hear me when I speak.
Our synchronization is makeshift, as well.
And yet, our hearts are one.
We are of one mind in our desire to bring you back to your senses.
Shut up.
Can you imagine how much of a strain Satsuki is bearing to let me fight?
No other human could do that.
No one but Satsuki Kiryuin!
So what?
It do not change the fact that she is a loser!
I am sick of hearing you yammering on and on, you dishrag!
I am going to chop up both you and
Do not you dare mock Satsuki!
Satsuki's sand castle is made of is steel!
It will not collapse that easily!
Butt the hell out!
If you cannot see what is in her heart, you cannot see anything!
Quit pissing me off, human!
What can you do with that little knife?!
What can he do?
Lure you into my firing range, I suppose.
Did you think that would do anything to Junketsu?
No, but it did allow me to get in close.
What the
I am going to rip Junketsu off of you!
Satsuki, you bitch!
This was your plan all along?!
Indeed!
Senketsu and I cannot defeat you in your current state.
However, if I give the Elite Four a fighting chance, it is possible!
Son of a...
Yes!
It went according to plan!
I still cannot believe that Satsuki proposed
a coordinated operation with the Elite Four.
But what is most surprising of all
is that you were able to accurately relay
such a convoluted message, Mankanshoku.
She wrote it on my hands!
That girl thinks of everything.
I cannot believe you would use yourself as bait.
I would do anything to win.
Did you forget that that is my modus operandi?
And now we are going to pull you out of Junketsu
and make you come back to your senses!
Why cannot it separate Matoi?!
Run!
Gamagoori!
Nui Harime!
You little
Nope, nope, nope!
Gosh, you humans sure like to waste time on things that do not work, do not you?
Those bullets are never going to hit me!
Ryuko will never be able to take off Junketsu.
Why not?
Because Junketsu's Life Fibers are tightly
linked with the ones inside Ryuko's body!
If you try to pull Junketsu off, they will snap, and she will die from the shock!
What?!
Why, you
The Kamui's been stitched to her body?
That is so mean!
What kind of penalty game is that?!
Mako Mankanshoku is on her way!
As a result of our recent successful buyout
of China and India's garment factories,
REVOCS now controls 100 of the world garment market.
This means that every human being on the planet
is wearing our clothing in one form or another.
Congratulations, ladies and gentlemen, Life Fibers have now spread to all humanity.
And now, I ask you to perform one last task for me.
After it arrived on Earth and gave us clothing,
the Original Life Fiber, the because of human evolution,
has remained asleep until the human race
reached a suitable level of evolution.
Keeping it safe has been the duty of the Kiryuin clan.
Only one family head may bear witness to its awakening.
I am grateful to time for allowing that family head to be me.
Because I will be able to witness the amazing event
that is about to transpire with my own two eyes!
What is that?
The beginning of the Cocoon Sphere Birth that
will soon make this world the Life Fibers'!
COCOON SPHERE NATIVITY
Congratulations.
Kuroido, do you and the others also wish to take part?
May we?
Yes.
Thank you!
Magnificent!
It feels so wonderful!
Lady Ragyo!
Now, let us be off.
To where it will all begin.
Chew on this!
Senketsu!
You are dead!
Do not!
I understand why you are angry, Ryuko!
I mean, if you cannot take that outfit off,
you cannot take a bath or wash yourself,
and you cannot get dressed up for a date!
But even so, that does not mean it is okay to go on a rampage like this!
What are you talking about?
Mankanshoku, run!
This is not the Matoi you used to know!
Ryuko is always Ryuko!
Even if you have got Life Fibers inside you,
even if you are mad that you are not human, you are still Ryuko!
And Senketsu is your Sunday best, same as always!
That girl is such a pest.
Mako?
MAKO!
Would you look at that!
I am taking your blood.
Just do not pass out from blood loss, all right?
I hate girls who try too hard by wearing clothes that just do not suit them.
It is so pathetic it makes my skin crawl!
I told you, that will not work!
Have not you figured it out yet?
No ordinary human can beat me!
Perhaps, but the blade of my heart is not broken just yet!
Oh, brother... you are so stubborn!
I am telling you, Ryuko belongs to Lady Ragyo.
We will see about that!
Are you trying to appeal to her feelings, too?
That will never work!
You have gotten soft, Satsuki!
It is because of you that I believe it is possible to turn the tables!
Because of me?
Yes, you!
If Ryuko Matoi has truly gone over to your side body and soul,
why have not you given her that Scissor Blade?!
That blade is the ultimate weapon to fight against Life Fibers.
The reason you still carry it
is because you still harbor doubts about her loyalties!
And it is in that uncertainty that our victory lies!
Your agitation has made me more convinced than ever!
We will be victorious!
Leave this one to us!
You see to Matoi, Lady Satsuki!
You are our hope!
I am counting on you.
Ryuko!
Destroy her along with Senketsu!
That is what Lady Ragyo wants, too!
Give these softies with their hope nonsense
a dose of cold, hard reality!
You got it.
Move it.
Stop this, Ryuko!
You are protecting that woman?
I will protect Mako.
But I will protect you, too, Ryuko.
Me?
Yes, you.
If you killed Mako here,
the one who would be hurt most of all would be you.
That is why I will not let you lay a hand on her!
What?
It is because you have been selfish that Senketsu is being worn by me!
This is not right!
The Ryuko I know can take off that outfit.
So let us hurry up and get changed, okay?
God, your voice is so annoying!
Now, Mankanshoku!
Jam Senketsu into the wound!
Senketsu!
Use your strength to shake Ryuko's Life Fibers loose from Junketsu!
Right!
On it!
Ryuko, I am coming!
I am going to force myself onto you!
Learn the power of the Sunday best!
Ryuko!
We are here to bring you home!
Ryuko!
I will kill anyone who ruins my happiness.
This is not happiness, not even close!
This is not you, Ryuko!
Shut your mouth.
Snap out of it, Ryuko!
Shut up!
Dummy, dummy, dummy!
Fine, go ahead and kill me!
If you are so intent on staying cooped up in here,
kill me and give up on being my Ryuko!
Ryuko!
Ryuko!
Matoi...
Oopsie, looks like they failed to win her over.
Ryuko, let us sink this tub!
What?
Give your crap a rest!
Impossible!
How dare you bastards put me into this outfit!
Ryuko!
Ryuko!
I am tired of all of this.
Ryuko!
I want it off!
- Matoi! - Transfer student!
I WANT IT OFF!
Stop, Matoi!
If you tear it off, you will die!
I would rather be dead!
I have to take this off even if I die!
Because if I do not...
I will not be able to wear Senketsu again!
NEXT EPISODE PREVIEW
Someone once said that each person's life is a tapestry.
A TAPESTRY
The time has come for two woven tapestries that
WOVEN
can never intermingle to overlap and become one.
OVERLAP
The impetus for this... is croquettes?
IMPETUS
CORQUETTES!?
Next time on Kill la Kill, Tell Me How You Feel.
TELL ME HOW YOU FEEL
EPISODE 22
